Title: The Loners
Writer: Guy Meirson (screenplay), Renen Schorr (screenplay), Moshe Zonder (screenplay)
Actors: Sasha Agronov, Anton 'Klin' Ostrovsky, Rotem Zissman-Cohen, Tzahi Grad
Plot: This human drama centers around two loner Russian soldiers who are caught smuggling arms and consequently arrested. The two characters do not want to lose their honor as soldiers even ...
